item.title: Premier League 2014-15 preview No19: West Brom

Alan Irvine has a strong coaching record, but has never before managed a team in the Premier League. Photograph: Alex Morton/Action Images
Ideye Brown moved to West Brom for £10m over the summer, but the striker failed to make Nigerias World Cup squad. Photograph: Antonio Calanni/AP
Ideye Brown moved to West Brom for £10m over the summer, but the striker failed to make Nigerias World Cup squad. Photograph: Antonio Calanni/AP

item.title: Tony Puliss departure brings Crystal Palace back to earth with a bang
item.description:
Tony Pulis guided Crystal Palace to 11th place when relegation had seemed a certainty last season and his departure two days before the start of the season has left supporters baffled
